activityType.description: The name of the activity type that this instance is based on

backgroundColor.description: Background color of the activity instance within an activity band

constraints.description: List of constraints associated with the activity instance

duration.description: How long the activity instance lasts

end.description: When the activity instance ends, as a Unix timestamp

endTimestamp.description: When the activity instances ends, as an ISO 8601 formatted date string

parameters.description: Parameters which augment the runtime behavior of the instance

start.description: When the activity instance starts, as a Unix timestamp

startTimestamp.description: When the activity instances starts, as an ISO 8601 formatted date string

textColor.description: Text color of the activity instance within an activity band

y.description: The y position of the activity instance within an activity band
